adrFormatAddress: 55 E 87th St #1f, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: I just have to say, I had a really scary thing happen to me after I got some bloodwork done, it looked like I might have leukemia or bone marrow cancer. As soon as WFM got the results they contacted me promptly and got me in to see PA-C Christine Pipchick the same day. Her bedside manner was excellent, comparable to the level of care I received from another amazing PA-C here who I’ve seen several times before, Nicole Kopchak. I felt listened to and heard, and Christine was probably in the room with me for at least half an hour, taking her time explaining the anomalies and the plan and providing me as much comfort as anyone can in a scary situation. They redid my bloodwork immediately, expedited it because of the possibility of serious illness and called me as promised the next morning with what turned out to be good news. I’ve been with WFM for 3 or so years now and I have never felt like my health was in better hands. They’ll really hear you at WFM and they’ll find a way to get you in pronto if you need to be seen; telemedicine appointments are also a breeze to schedule and I can usually get one within a couple hours of calling. They practice preventative care, and check for problems before it’s too late. They treat the whole you. The practitioners and nurses here actually care, and they treat you like a whole person, rather than just a dollar amount. Forever recommending this practice.

originalText.text: I had a first visit today with PA Nicole Kopchak, and I can honestly say that she was the nicest, most thorough PA/Doctor I have ever seen. Our zoom call lasted over 15 minutes, which never happens with most healthcare providers. I didn’t feel rushed and had all of my questions answered. 10/10 would recommend

Our zoom call lasted over 15 minutes, which never happens with most healthcare providers. I didn’t feel rushed and had all of my questions answered. 10/10 would recommend

originalText.text: NP Faith Lambert is an absolutely outstanding healthcare professional. I have never felt more respected and cared for. She really listens to her patients and works with you to look for solutions and treatment options. I'm so glad that I found her!

text.text: NP Faith Lambert is an absolutely outstanding healthcare professional. I have never felt more respected and cared for. She really listens to her patients and works with you to look for solutions and treatment options. I'm so glad that I found her!

originalText.text: Wonderful. very helpful and kind. Seriously it was a big step for me and I was scared as all hell but Simone and the nurses were outstanding . So thanks to Westside for their compassion so I can keep working towards a positive physical and mental health.

text.text: Wonderful. very helpful and kind. Seriously it was a big step for me and I was scared as all hell but Simone and the nurses were outstanding . So thanks to Westside for their compassion so I can keep working towards a positive physical and mental health.

originalText.text: If you want to discuss anything you have to pay $35 out of pocket. I had a 2 minute phone call after my appointment and they sent me a message the next day informing me I owe them 35 dollars for that and that it was a separate appointment.
